entry.dcterms:description: The aim of the survey is collect information about the attitudes towards the planned taxation of the cafeteria system in Hungary
entry.dcterms:subject: law, crime and legal systems
social welfare policy and systems
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
telephone interview
